article_html:
When Jackie Morris was growing up she wanted nothing more than a bird of her own and to live in a keeper’s cottage in a wood – inspired by the treasured illustrations of Charles Tunnicliffe in Tarka The Otter and My Friend Flicka.

So when Jackie discovered the story of a rescued peregrine on Ramsey Island in Wales, she created her latest book Queen of the Sky to tell it
text:
When Jackie Morris was growing up she wanted nothing more than a bird of her own and to live in a keeper’s cottage in a wood – inspired by the treasured illustrations of Charles Tunnicliffe in Tarka The Otter and My Friend Flicka.

So when Jackie discovered the story of a rescued peregrine on Ramsey Island in Wales, she created her latest book Queen of the Sky to tell it
title: How I fell in love with peregrine falcons – in pictures
